text: Yeah do you have any preference for what sort of environment you would like to work in? And would you say you're set on chemistry or would you find natural sciences or food science or something like that interesting too? That sounds good my mum works at a pharmacy and it is somewhat related to chemistry! What sports do you play? It sounds like you're very proactive though so I'm impressed!
I had a poster presentation today and I was so nervous before but it went well so I'm relieved! How do you find it making presentations to people?
